ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lsm01.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) |

| 3 |  | #P_subgrcl | |- ( X e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> G e. Grp ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_0subg | |- ( G e. Grp -> { .0. } e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_syl | |- ( X e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> { .0. } e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) |
| 6 | 1 | #P_subg0cl | |- ( X e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> .0. e. X ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_snssd | |- ( X e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> { .0. } C_ X ) |
| 8 | 2 | #P_lsmss2 | |- ( ( X e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ { .0. } e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ { .0. } C_ X ) -> ( X .(+) { .0. } ) = X ) |
| 9 | 5, 7, 8 | #P_mpd3an23 | |- ( X e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> ( X .(+) { .0. } ) = X ) |
